resources.string: The user name or password is incorrect
Learn one way to build applications with Angular and reuse your code and abilities to build apps for any deployment target. For web, mobile web, native mobile and native desktop.

Help protect your website and its users with clear and fair website terms and conditions. These terms and conditions for a website set out key issues such as acceptable use, privacy, cookies, registration and passwords, intellectual property, links to other sites, termination and disclaimers of responsibility. Terms and conditions are used and necessary to protect a website owner from liability of a user relying on the information or the goods provided from the site then suffering a loss. Making your own terms and conditions for your website is hard, not impossible, to do. It can take a few hours to few days for a person with no legal background to make. But worry no more; we are here to help you out. All you need to do is fill up the blank spaces and then you will receive an email with your personalized terms and conditions.

Companies whose business models revolve around handling sensitive customer information find it incredibly important to establish trust with their users. A clear and comprehensive Privacy Policy agreement that tells users exactly what information the company collects and what it does with that information inspires confidence in a business. It gives users a sense of security knowing how much control they have over their personal data under the conditions they sign up for. Your Privacy Policy agreement should inform your users about how your website or app handles their personal information. Your users must be also be informed about the reason for the collection of information, as well as how long their data will be stored on your servers.
I have read and agree to ExSTREAM Terms of Use
Only create a new account if you\'re setting up ExSTREAM for a new company or group of properties.
If you already use ExSTREAM at a property, you can add a new property in your existing account. Login to your account.
If you are working for a company that already uses ExSTREAM. contact that company\'s system administrator to be added as a user.
Not sure if there\'s an ExSTREAM account for your property already? Contact Us.
Your ExSTREAM account can be accessed through our mobile app or from the web browser of your desktop computer. To create your accounts custom URL. enter text with no spaces or punctuation:
I have read and agree to ExSTREAM Terms of Use
Password should contain one upperCase, one lowercase, one numeric and minimum Of 8 characters
